import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import tracks from '../metadata/track.json'; function MatchList({ match }) { console.log( match ); const { playerCount, player, matchResult, startTime, trackId } = match; const { matchRank, matchTime } = player; function msToTime(s) { function pad(n, z) { z = z || 2; return ('00' + n).slice(-z); } var ms = s % 1000; s = (s - ms) / 1000; var secs = s % 60; s = (s - secs) / 60; var mins = s % 60; return pad(mins) + "'" + pad(secs) + "'" + pad(ms, 3); } const curruntDate = new Date(); const startDate = new Date( startTime ); const dateDiff = Math.floor((curruntDate - startDate) / (1000*60*60*24)); const trackName = tracks.find( e => { return e.id === trackId; }).name; return (
